summary: This document contains an email exchange between Paul Barrett and Paul Morris discussing plans for a casual lunch meeting. The correspondence indicates their roles as Managing Directors at different financial institutions and suggests a friendly professional relationship.

persons.name: Paul Barrett
persons.context: Paul Barrett is a Managing Director at Global Investment Opportunities Group, and he initiates the lunch meeting proposal.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is a Managing Director at Deutsche Bank Private Bank and responds positively to Barrett's lunch invitation.

connections.description: Both individuals are Managing Directors at different financial institutions and are coordinating a lunch meeting.

locations: Cafe Metro, southeast corner of 51st and Lex, New York, NY
320 Park Avenue, 14th Floor, New York, NY 10022
345 Park Avenue, 27th Floor, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: The email exchange is dated October 29, 2013.
Paul Barrett suggests meeting at Cafe Metro for lunch.
Paul Morris expresses flexibility regarding the lunch location.
